channel.title: Question about rs account selling
channel.description: Best place to sell at ?( on another forum of course lol...)

item.title: Question about rs account selling
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:7, topic:400409”]mmoexchange.net, the selling site that rsbots.net owns. I’ve sold several accounts and around 500m there with no problems. You just gotta make sure that the people send the money as a gift on paypal and include a note thats like: I am the owner of this paypal account. This payment is for virtual goods which I have already recieved. I fully understand PayPals Policy on virtual items, and I have no reason to dispute this payment.[/quote]I will try them out thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about rs account selling
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

marcbob:

mmoexchange.net, the selling site that rsbots.net owns. I’ve sold several accounts and around 500m there with no problems. You just gotta make sure that the people send the money as a gift on paypal and include a note thats like: I am the owner of this paypal account. This payment is for virtual goods which I have already recieved. I fully understand PayPals Policy on virtual items, and I have no reason to dispute this payment.

Ooo, that sounds like a good required thing, I’m starting a gold site soon and thats going to really help.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about rs account selling
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

mmoexchange.net, the selling site that rsbots.net owns. I’ve sold several accounts and around 500m there with no problems. You just gotta make sure that the people send the money as a gift on paypal and include a note thats like: I am the owner of this paypal account. This payment is for virtual goods which I have already recieved. I fully understand PayPals Policy on virtual items, and I have no reason to dispute this payment.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about rs account selling
item.dc:creator: @DevilsCape DevilsCape
item.description:
@DevilsCape wrote:

if it have high stats … 1500+ totall

a 99 in a specific combat skill . better be 99 range or 99 str …

or anything special in it like it have 50m+

then u might be able to sell it 4 lil not bad price

but i prefer u sell it to someone u know … in IRL

or just give it away …

im sorry i dont guess its gd idea to sell it in any of this current websites

…

or idk just sell it in rs4gold…

but they wont give high price at all

Read full topic

item.title: Question about rs account selling
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

There are no real “Good” places to sell your account other then a site you own. There will always be scammers.

Read full topic
